## MessageBar.validate() method

Validates a message format string, to make sure it matches the given argument array.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static validate(format: string, args?: any[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  format | string | Message format string. |
|  args | any\[\] | _(Optional)_ Array of embedded values to include in the message. |

**Returns:**

void
